attributes.description:
Highly motivated and professional marketer, I am currently looking for new challenges in marketing or digital activities. 
My education in business and management has allowed me the skills to prosper in the demanding FMCG industry. With my experience in large multinationals I have acquired special skills in brand management, digital activities and team management.
attributes.title: Alexandre Barret

attributes.description:
P&G, Geneva
ABM on Hard Surface Cleaners

Key responsibilities:

> Lead brand's strategic choices and vision for bathroom products in Western Europe
> Initiated and implemented digital strategy and plans for WE Mr Propre (including SEO/SEM, local websites, e-material, social media and online promotional activity). Aligned management on investment priorities to ensure best presence online and maximise ROI
> Tracked marketing budget, lead two marketing internal audits for total Home Care WE.

Key achievements:

> Successfully launched Facebook pages & websites in 3 countries, increased HSC digital spending from 0 to 12% of total media investment and increased e-turnover by 517%
> Successfully lead new bathroom product launch across WE and increased P&G bathroom volume/value shares
> Identified business opportunities in Spain and Italy and successfully launched new products

Skills developed: Leadership, collaboration, managing multiple priorities, strategic thinking
attributes.title: Assistant Brand Manager @ Procter&Gamble

attributes.description:
July 08 – July 09 - ExxonMobil, Paris
Business Partner on Lubricants for retail and industries

Key responsibilities:

> Coordinated operational marketing plans for Esso & Mobil brands. Set up, managed & followed promotions for retail & industrial customers in collaboration with sales team 
> Analysed market shares and brand marketing fundamentals
> Organised & coordinated participation to business fairs
> Supported sales team during yearly negotiation period with major customers

Key achievements:

> Successfully managed promo campaign with 120 points of sale impacted
> Developed retail marketing local plans to replace Esso brand by Mobil brand
> Lead development of multi-partners point of sales material for a specific customer 

Skills developed: Proactivness, detail orientation, customer understanding
attributes.title: Business Partner @ ExxonMobil
Exchange semester in MBA Program Of Xavier University

attributes.description:
BEM MANAGEMENT SCHOOL BORDEAUX, 
Master in Science of Management, major in marketing and project management

Jan 07 – June 08 - Aquitaine Marketing Services,
Methodology-Legal responsible & Project Manager
Junior-Enterprise of BEM Management School, ISO 9001:2000 certified; annual turnover of € 120,000; 
2007 Excellence Award, that awarded the French Best Junior-Enterprise 

Key responsibilities:

> Resolved clients’ issues leading adapted market studies. Analysed data, presented results and recommendations to clients
> Recruited and managed team to work on the different projects
> Reading over and checking quality of all documents before release to clients

Key achievements:

> Realised 14 studies (45% of annual volume) and signed contracts with new prestigious clients like BP, Oxbow, Unibail Rodamco, Mini, Bordeaux Chamber of Commerce
> Successfully trained to J.E.'s specific rules the successors of my team

Skills developed: Autonomy, team management, client focus
